name: Car Racer: City Driving School
description:
Entertain with amazing supercar driving with multiple driving, racing modes. Just buckle up your seat belt & start mission. Open garage choose best vehicle & follow the map to complete each mission. In the very first mode just learn all road sings & try to complete in one attempt. Enjoy offroad race, street race, mountain race & city car driving. Drive in open world & be the racer master of this arena.


Start race & hit all obstacle on the roads with car crash racing challenge. If your vehicle damage on the road you have multiple chance to repair it. Replacing flat tyres, replace chipped windscreens, replace key engine parts, carrying out all services which garages offer to customers in this real car driving & racing simulator.


Features:

- High-speed racing
- Enjoy Challenging missions
- Chance to repair vehicle
- Number of Vehicle to choose from
